operations with defarea collections
[definition area (defarea)]


Functions

bool surfit::defareas_delall ()
 removes all defarea's from surfit_defareas
bool surfit::defareas_del (int pos)
 removes defarea from surfit_defareas at "pos" position
bool surfit::defareas_load (const char *filename, const char *defareaname=0)
 loads defarea from ROFF file (see datafile for details) and adds it to surfit_defareas
bool surfit::defareas_load_grd (const char *filename, const char *defareaname=NULL)
 loads defarea from SURFER grd file (ASCII format) and adds it to surfit_defareas
bool surfit::defareas_unload (const char *name)
 removes first defarea from surfit_defareas named with "name"
defarea * surfit::defareas_at (int pos)
 returns defarea at "pos" position from surfit_defareas
defarea * surfit::defareas_first ()
 returns first defarea from surfit_defareas
defarea * surfit::defareas_last ()
 returns last defarea from surfit_defareas
int surfit::defareas_size ()
 returns amount of defareations in surfit_defareas
int surfit::defareas_info ()
 prints information about defareations in surfit_defareas
